name: KiteInnovations Power Kite  and Surfing Shop
overview: Whether your a beginner or an expert kite-flyer, KiteInnovations.com has the right kite for you. Our store offers kites of all kinds for all ages at very affordable prices. You can choose from our single line, dual line, and quad line kite models made by premier kite manufacturers. We also have a wide range of kite kits and accessories that will complete your hobby and make kite-flying an enjoyable experience. Store owner Ben Frankstone, has been flying kites since he was a kid, and never stopped. He used to make his own paper kites then and was always been amazed by how they could stay up in the air. From a mere childhood pastime, kite-flying later became a passion for Ben. To top it up, Ben has also done kitesurfing, an extreme sport. With his knowledge and experience when it come to kites, Ben has decided to open up his very own online kite store so he could share his passion to fellow kite-flying enthusiasts.
